title: France panorama. [No. 70/36]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The new port of Saint-Raphael - new basins with space for many more pleasure-craft. 2. The Palais de la Decouverte - the major scientific discoveries made understandable to all. 3. Summer pop songs at Saint Tropez - the season’s hits in this vacationland. 4. Jean and Francois Clouet at the Court of France - the works of a dynasty of portrait artists revives a whole period of French history. 5. The City of Nice - a rapidly expanding city, the fifth largest in France.
